attributes.background: Being Gay or bi isn't a choice for us young people. We can't help who we fall in love with. If it's man and man, Women and women or man and women. I have been through bullying myself at my old secondary school last year in year 10. And it wasn't nice at all to get bullied. It made me feel down.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561059
